node.title: Cricket Australia's treatment of Tim Paine 'appalling', Cricket Tasmania says
node.alt: Cricketer Tim Paine stands in the nets holding his arms out wide  dressed in whites.
node.description: The board of Cricket Tasmania condemnsÂ the treatment of former Test captain Tim Paine by Cricket Australia, saying the national body regarded him as "dispensable".
node.content: ["The board of Cricket Tasmania has condemned the treatment of former Test captain Tim Paine by Cricket Australia (CA), after his resignation due to a sexting scandal on Friday.", "Tim Paine stood down as captain after it was revealed he had been involved in a text-messaging exchange with a former female Cricket Tasmania employee in 2017.", "Cricket Tasmania chairman Andrew Gaggin put out a statement this afternoon saying anger amongst the Tasmanian cricket community at the treatment of Paine was \"palpable\".", "\"At a time when CA should have supported Tim, he was evidently regarded as dispensable,\" he said.", "\"The treatment afforded to the Australian Test captain by Cricket Australia has been appalling\u00a0and the worst since Bill Lawry over 50 years ago.\"", "More to come."]
